author: Kurt Knutsson, CyberGuy Report
title: When clicks turn into scams on Facebook ads
description: Facebook scam ads now leverage AI and deepfakes to create convincing celebrity endorsements, targeting specific demographics with sophisticated schemes.
content:
Scam ads on Facebook have evolved beyond the days of misspelled headlines and sketchy product photos. 
Today, many are powered by artificial intelligence, fueled by deepfake technology and distribut… [+9033 chars]
